name: Funny Fishing New 2018 hd
description:
"Fishing for Kids New Evolved" is a learning game that will help your child develop his memory and ability to concentrate.

Fishing for children is designed for toddlers and children of all ages.
Choosing a level of complexity that you can easily simplify or complicate for your child.

How to play Fishing for Kids New Evolved:
In the upper corner there is an icon in the form of a fish, which you need to scoop up. Choose this fish among others and click on it - the scoop will catch it! If child caught the wrong fish - don't worry, the fish will release bubbles, and you can try again until you catch the right one, and the scooped fish will make a funny sound :)
Fishing for Kids New Evolved is a funny game which you can download or get absolutely free."
